overview: It is summer. Three friends set out on their journey. Life lies ahead of them. Falling in love and wanting, fighting and despairing. Having to endure themselves. Having to endure themselves with all their wishes and hopes and those of others. To dream? But what? Of what? Italy. The sea. Leon, Joaquin and Johanna. They are three lost people. But the world belongs to them.
tagline: They are three lost people. But the world belongs to them.
title: JuliAugust
